thread.title: Mark Wahlberg left Super Bowl LI before the Patriots' epic comeback
thread.title_full: Mark Wahlberg left Super Bowl LI before the Patriots' epic comeback

title: Mark Wahlberg left Super Bowl LI before the Patriots' epic comeback
text:
Mark Wahlberg left Super Bowl LI before the Patriots’ epic comeback Tom Pennington/Getty Images Feb 5, 2017 at 10:35p ET 0Shares 
Mark Wahlberg is one of the many prominent celebrity Patriots fans who attended Super Bowl LI, but he didn’t stick around to see his team’s spectacular comeback effort. 
— Allen Reid (@Allen_Reid) February 6, 2017 
New England trailed 28-3 with a little over two minutes remaining in the third quarter, before scoring 31 unanswered points to stun the Falcons in overtime to take home the title. 
Assuming Wahlberg didn’t make it back into the stadium, it’s got to sting knowing he missed witnessing history in person. 0
